author: Pablo Ventura
text: Never stop learning. I’ve learned a Valuable lesson the other day. But I learned. The best policy is honesty and truth. I’m not perfect but I have learned. I value things more everyday and things that matter to me and things I hold sacred.

author: Pablo Ventura
text: Done feeling sorry for myself, time to pick myself back up. Once you hit the bottom there’s only one way to go .Up. ⬆️

author: Pablo Ventura
text: I’ve broken all of my moral codes to lower myself. For that I am ashamed of. I’ve had to live with the guilt. Not anymore, I don’t carry it anymore . I’m free.

author: Pablo Ventura
text: The world will tell you I’m no good for you, but I’d die for you. Without thinking twice. 🖤

author: Pablo Ventura
text: The Great Neal Adams left such an impact and influenced the masses. He is just an Uncanny man who worked on so manny great books and graced us with so manny epic covers. One of his iconic covers is that of “Ali vs. Superman .” His work influenced me a lot .#RIPNealAdams

author: Pablo Ventura
text: Wow, I can’t believe we lost another great legend. I’m glad I got to meet him @Comic_Con multiple times when I attended years ago. He was so kind and nice . I remember buying his books at the flea markets, I was amazed by his anatomy. Just hurt he was epic. #RIPNealAdams

author: Pablo Ventura
text: If my life was a sitcom, I’d have two spin offs 12 episodes each and a grand finale movie cliff hanger. I have been through a lot . But I’m solid. Thank you God for everything . 🖤

author: Pablo Ventura
text: God give me strength today. Never falter. Never quit. #faith

author: Pablo Ventura
text: What kinda sack of shit  manipulates a person and tells them they will kill themselves if they leave. Clearly one without self worth. You gotta be a real nobody with low self esteem to pull that card. People will say do anything to hang on to a person .

author: Pablo Ventura
text: I have one thing you will never have or could have. Her heart. I don’t even have to try. 🖤
